example.code:
Get-IAMPolicyVersionList -PolicyArn arn:aws:iam::123456789012:policy/MyManagedPolicy
CreateDate Document IsDefaultVersion VersionId ---------- -------- ---------------- --------- 2/12/2015 9:39:53 AM True v2 2/12/2015 9:39:09 AM False v1
example.description: This example returns the list of available versions of the policy whose ARN is arn:aws:iam::123456789012:policy/MyManagedPolicy. To get the policy document for a specific version, use the Get-IAMPolicyVersion command and specify the VersionId of the one you want.
